memberdef.name: FS_Desc
memberdef.initializer: = { USBD_FS_DeviceDescriptor , USBD_FS_LangIDStrDescriptor , USBD_FS_ManufacturerStrDescriptor , USBD_FS_ProductStrDescriptor , USBD_FS_SerialStrDescriptor , USBD_FS_ConfigStrDescriptor , USBD_FS_InterfaceStrDescriptor }

memberdef.name: __ALIGN_END
memberdef.initializer: = { 0x12, USB_DESC_TYPE_DEVICE, 0x00, 0x02, 0x02, 0x02, 0x00, USB_MAX_EP0_SIZE, LOBYTE(USBD_VID), HIBYTE(USBD_VID), LOBYTE(USBD_PID_FS), HIBYTE(USBD_PID_FS), 0x00, 0x02, USBD_IDX_MFC_STR, USBD_IDX_PRODUCT_STR, USBD_IDX_SERIAL_STR, USBD_MAX_NUM_CONFIGURATION }

briefdescription.para: Create the serial number string descriptor.
Return the serial number string descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: : This file implements the USB device descriptors.
